title: AppSync to SNS
description: Create an AppSync API with an SNS HTTP data source

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This CDK application deploys an AppSync API which uses an SNS HTTP datasource. AWS AppSync provides a 'publish' query that sends a message to the configured SNS topic. The query returns the response MessageId, and the SequenceNumber if using a  FIFO (first-in-first-out) topic.
See the Github repo for detailed instructions
